author: mtosi
body:

but because of issues w/ the synch between 81x and 80x

hope everything is fine, now
sorry for the confusion !
@fwyzard @dmitrijus @vanbesien @Martin-Grunewald @perrotta
title: add timing VS lumi (for HLT monitoring)
